description:
GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web & mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation. This allows end users to, for example, view PDF documents from within your .NET applications without having to install Adobe Reader.

With GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET, your app's users can view documents and images of the following file formats:

 - Portable Document Format: PDF
 - Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM
 - Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB
 - Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
 - Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW
 - Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT
 - Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML, EMLX
 - OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP
 - Rich Text Format: RTF
 - Plain Text File: TXT
 - Comma-Separated Values: CSV
 - HyperText Markup Language: HTML, MHT, MHTML
 - Extensible Markup Language: XML
 - XML Paper Specification: XPS
 - AutoCAD Drawing File Format: DXF, DWG (2004)
 - Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, multi-page TIFF
 - Electronic publication: EPUB
 - Windows Icon: ICO

Documents can be both rasterized and converted to SVG+HTML+CSS, delivering high-fidelity native text rendering.

GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET comes with a convenient UI, which allows users to easily navigate documents when viewing them. For instance, users can scroll multi-page documents, turn pages with the Go Forward/Backward buttons, jump straight to a specified page, search for text within the document using keywords, preview pages with thumbnails, zoom, print and download documents right from a web-browser.

For more details on the GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET Library, please visit our website: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-viewer-library

Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET library without evaluation limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
We are pleased to share a new version of GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET, with the following improvements
Bugs Fixed
WEB-1195	Viewer.NET - Black background color is displayed in particular ICO files
WEB-1223	Displaced text when viewing a PDF file
WEB-1417	Start menu shortcuts remain after uninstalling the component
WEB-1422	Datetimes in the "Sent" field are shown incorrect when displaying a EML file
WEB-1481	Newly added layout options are not translated onto spanish (translation is available)
WEB-1505	Zooming in and zooming out of the document pages is not working when the original document is removed on the server-side
WEB-1506	Printing is not working when the original document is removed on the server-side
WEB-1509	A PDF document of 851 pages opens slowly (in a few minutes) when the text selection is enabled in the WinForms control
WEB-1511	The WinForms control hangs for 3-30 seconds when selecting text
WEB-1513	Downloading the PDF-version of the document is not working when the original document is removed on the server-side
WEB-1517	The last line of text selection is not copied in WinForms Viewer
WEB-1518	WinForms Viewer scrolls to the first page on resizing
WEB-1519	WinForms Viewer takes 600 Mb of RAM after opening a document of 841 pages with text selection enabled
WEB-1538	Distorted and inappropriate thumbnails when using HTML-based mode and "useHtmlThumbnails: true" option
WEB-1549	Viewer transfers the viewport to the first page when zooming in and Virtual Scrolling is enabled
WEB-1557	"TypeError: this.closestArea.offset is not a function" when clicking search and not all pages are loaded
WEB-1568	Horizontal scroll bar is missing when browser window width is too small
WEB-1569	The Fit Width zoom is incorrect after calling the setWidth JS API method for Viewer
WEB-1572	The viewer area is invisible after setWidth when inner thumbnails are enabled
WEB-1579	Invalid Viewer initialization code in the "CacheGenerationSignalR" sample project
WEB-1351	Viewer.NET - search navigation buttons don't navigate to search result for particular file in Chrome
WEB-1352	Viewer.NET - Incorrect search navigation for particular file in FF/IE11
WEB-1355	Viewer.NET - Search does not work for particular PDF file in html/image based engines
WEB-1400	Viewer.NET - "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'top' of undefined" errors occur in browser console after specific steps
WEB-1179	DocumentCache.GenerateImages generates folders with quality 100 and unspecified when 100 is set
WEB-1166	Viewer.NET - Words started with quotes or apostrophes isn't highlighted for "treatPhrasesInDoubleQuotesAsExactPhrases(true)"
WEB-1613	Different appearance of a watermark on a document in the browser and in the PDF-version
WEB-983	Viewer.NET - Tooltips are not fully displayed in IE for specific case
summary: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web and mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation.
title: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET
